results.title: Toy story (Captioned)
results.creator_credit: Walt Disney Pictures, Pixar Animation Studios, Ralph Guggenheim, Bonnie Arnold and John Lasseter
results.brief_description: Awarded a special Academy Award for Special Achievement, this fully animated adventure is riotous fun for kids of all ages. When a draw-stringed cowboy named Woody, his boy’s favourite toy, is replaced one birthday by the latest toy - a flashy new space-ranger named Buzz Lightyear, it sparks an outrageous tiff between toys. Accidentally whisked away from home and into the clutches of the neighbourhood bully, these two squabbling rivals must work together as a team if they are to escape. Visual wizardry, uproarious laughs and the coolest characters ever assembled transform the world’s first computer-animated feature film into an incomparable movie marvel.

results.title: Towser
results.brief_description: In his adventures, Towser - a dog of the world - encounters some challenging situations. Fortunately, he is very resourceful!

results.title: Town planning: the master plan
results.brief_description: A graphic illustration of how the science of town planning can be directed towards the re-planning of a city so that the mistakes of the past may be corrected and a result achieved in which business, residential and industrial areas are properly zoned. The film contrasts random growth with systematic direction that can produce a beautiful, efficient and comfortable city.

results.title: Town musicians
results.brief_description: Interesting animation techniques are used in this version of the Grimm Brothers’ tale about the donkey, dog, cat and rooster who set out for Bremen to become town musicians. On their way they sing outside the hideout of some robbers, and make such a din that the robbers take fright, leaving the animals with a comfortable home. Animation by Armin Schaffer, Dan Hunn and Stephen Muffat.

results.title: Town meeting of the world
results.brief_description: this film is based on a recording of Mr Attlee’s opening speech at the first session of the UNO General Assembly in London in 1946. Designed to instil in its audience an active interest in the work of the United Nations Organization, the film shows some of the horrors of war, and some of the fruits of peace.

results.title: Towards the full life
results.creator_credit: BBC-TV, Norman Swallow and Anthony de Lotbinière
results.brief_description:
Episode of “The World is ours” series
A UNESCO experiment in the Nile Valley where in a few years, by improving agricultural methods and hygiene, and encouraging education, enormous advances have been made in the living standards of Egyptian villagers. A centre was established in the Nile delta for technical and general education which attracted students from all over the Middle East and became the nerve centre of great changes.

results.title: Towards school
results.creator_credit: Film Australia, Malcolm Otton and Antonio Colacino
results.brief_description:
Episode number 4 of Series “The Developing child”
Preschool is, for the child, the gateway between the familiarity of home, and the formal education system. Shows children at play, developing and practising new skills.
